SELECT mpd.material_partial_detail_key, mpd.partial_id, CASE WHEN mpd.belongs = 2 THEN concat(pa.code , ' *') ELSE pa.code END as `code`, pa.name as partial_name, (mpd.waiting_receive_quantity - mpd.waiting_quantity) as recept_quantity, (mpd.quantity - mpd.waiting_receive_quantity) as cur_quantity, mpd.waiting_receive_quantity, po.process_code, (cm.partial_id is not null) as append, (mpd.belongs = 1) as bom_quantity, mp.arrival_plan_date, mpd.status FROM material_partial_detail mpd LEFT JOIN position po ON po.position_id=mpd.position_id JOIN partial pa ON pa.partial_id=mpd.partial_id JOIN material m ON mpd.material_id = m.material_id JOIN material_partial mp ON mp.material_id=mpd.material_id and mp.occur_times=mpd.occur_times left join consumable_manage cm on pa.partial_id = cm.partial_id and cm.delete_flg = 0 WHERE mpd.material_id=#{material_id} AND mpd.occur_times=#{occur_times} AND mpd.status < 9 AND
(po.line_id in(12,14) or po.line_id is null)
(po.line_id = #{line_id} or po.line_id is null)
ORDER by bom_quantity asc, recept_quantity,waiting_receive_quantity desc
mapper.update: update material_partial_detail set waiting_receive_quantity=waiting_receive_quantity - #{recept_quantity}, r_operator_id = #{r_operator_id}, recent_receive_time=now() where material_partial_detail_key=#{material_partial_detail_key}
update material_partial_detail set status = 9, waiting_receive_quantity=0, r_operator_id = #{r_operator_id}, recent_receive_time=now() where material_partial_detail_key=#{material_partial_detail_key}
mapper.select: SELECT mpd.material_partial_detail_key, mpd.partial_id, CASE WHEN mpd.belongs = 2 THEN concat(pa.code , ' *') ELSE pa.code END as `code`, pa.name as partial_name, mpd.waiting_quantity, (mpd.waiting_receive_quantity - mpd.waiting_quantity) as recept_quantity, (mpd.quantity - mpd.waiting_receive_quantity) as cur_quantity, mpd.waiting_receive_quantity, pa.consumable_flg as append, mpd.arrival_plan_date, (mpd.belongs = 1) as bom_quantity, mpd.arrival_plan_date, mpd.status FROM material_partial_detail mpd JOIN `partial` pa ON pa.partial_id=mpd.partial_id WHERE mpd.material_id=#{material_id} AND (mpd.position_id=#{position_id} OR mpd.position_id IS NULL) AND mpd.status > 0 ORDER by bom_quantity asc,waiting_receive_quantity desc, status = 3
